thread.title: Thrifty: 10 Percent Off Spring and Summer Car Rentals
thread.title_full: Thrifty: 10 Percent Off Spring and Summer Car Rentals

title: Thrifty: 10 Percent Off Spring and Summer Car Rentals
text:
Home > Car Rental Deals > Thrifty: 10 Percent Off Spring and Summer Car Rentals Thrifty: 10 Percent Off Spring and Summer Car Rentals   - September 4, 2015 at 3:45 PM Tweet 
Need a car for the weekend? Now through January 31, 2016, Thrifty is discounting 10 percent off weekend rentals on economy through premium car classes. 
How to get this deal: To get the discount, visit the Thrifty 's sale page, pick up the vehicle at participating locations nationwide between now through January 31, 2016, and use promo code SO10E . 
The fine print: Vehicles must be picked up by January 31. Rental agreements require a three-day minimum. Advance reservations are required. Blackout periods may apply. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices across multiple properties and from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
